Text:
Hoppas ni gillar den!
Hope you like it!
No seeders, baby.  How do you expect me to download this?

Well, I have uploaded a sample from the book now. It contains the WHOLE first short horror story in the book. 

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/4299860/Extract_from_the_HORROR_book_the_dead_will_inherit_the_earth_by_
By the way, three stories from this book can be found at screams-of-terror for free
